topics.body:
"@HJSDGCE":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/549bf1216368727724320200#post_549bf1216368727724320200
I dunno, Rainbow seems more like the risk taker, I bet she'd go for a run with the Marines, AJ, Twilight would probably not want to go anywhere near the frontlines of combat. And well Pinkie's a kind of a wild mare, she'd go and mess the hell out of everything and well Fluttershy I'm not sure, but a combat medic would be her role, I mean carrying people back and forth seems like something she'd do. 

If you're talking about background ponies, there are tons, and I mean plenty I'd send out to see how long they'd last. Like Thunderlane, or Caramel, they're pretty expendable.

topics.body:
Well I had another complete shit Christmas and I don't even have any alcohol to drown it out.

If you're wondering why I have a love-hate relationship with Christmas is I love Christmas but hate how my family celebrates it.

"Choo choo!  Here comes santa!"
"Thanks uncle for spending so much time with us"
"Thanks for spending lots of money you don't even have on my kids and on me; here's a christmas card in return"
*next christmas*
"Choo choo!  Here comes santa!"
"Thanks uncle for spending so much time with us"
"Thanks for spending lots of money you don't even have on my kids and on me; here's a Christmas card in return"

It's starting to depress me cause I haven't gotten a legitimate present in over a decade and it's the same story with birthdays.  The only "gifts" I ever get are holiday cards.  I like Christmas, giving gifts and all, but I would settle for even a gift card in return cause at least that I can use to get something that isn't a holiday card.  That's kind of depressing when you have such utter shit Christmases and Birthdays that you want gift cards instead.

They want want want want presents but god forbid they ever do anything in return.

Tl:dr; here's to a decade of utter shit Christmases that nobody cares about me and only care how many presents I'm giving them.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

Atleast I'm more lucky and by more lucky I mean I catch a break to give presents to kids.
